name: Mini Soccer All-Stars
description:
Mini Soccer All-Stars is an amazing game based on table soccer or table football that controls with an analog stick for movement, and one single button for spinning. It offers a single player arcade experience where you play against several AI’s of different skills. It includes exciting background music, awesome graphics and amazing physics.

The idea is simple: you are playing against every other player, and you can score in any of the multiple gates in the futuristic field. The position, angle and speed of the ball when spinning allows you to control the ball in very different ways, and the enemies will make it difficult to success. Each match last 60 seconds, and the gameplay is fast and rewarding, allowing intense competition.

There is no other soccer or sport game with equivalent graphic quality on mobile platform. The screen is drown in neon-like bloom effects and transparencies, reflections and lots of details.

Mini Soccer All-Stars uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere.

Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2018, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.

Music: "Music: Summer, Pop Dance and Dance - Bensound.com"
